strings.Value: "Enjoyment is the essence of life. The short-lived make plans, build careers, strive for power â€“ as if they have the time for this!"
"If my life were so terrifyingly short, I would think of nothing but pleasure!"
"And how do you think we should spend our short lives? With no plans, no struggle for a better lot, no dreams? Ha!"
